passage.title: A kind boy
passage.paragraph: David is a kind boy. One day, he goes to the shop to buy a basketball. On the way to the shop he finds a girl crying. "Why are you crying, little girl?" The girl says, "I'm lost. I can't find my parents." "Let me help you." David says.
David helps the little girl find her parents. But when he comes back to the shop, it is closed.
